pageProduct.name: Voost Hydrate Orange Effervescent Tablets 20 Pack
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Voost Electrolyte Hydrate Orange helps relieve symptoms of dehydration.

Uses:
- Relieve symptoms of dehydration.
- Support body electrolyte balance.
- Restore body electrolyte balance after exercise. 

Suitable For: Vegan friendly.

Product Claims: No added dairy, lactose, soy or yeast.

Size: 20 Tablets

Flavour: Orange

Warnings

Avoid mixing the product with cordial, juice, soft or sports drinks.
Each tablet contains 78mg of Potassium. If you have kidney disease or are taking heart or blood pressure medicines, consult your doctor or pharmacist before use. Keep out of reach of children.

Ingredients

Active ingredients per tablet:
Sodium Chloride 87.5mg, Potassium Chloride 149mg, Sodium Bicarbonate 378mg, Citric Acid 684mg, Glucose 1.87g.

Contains: Sucralose and sugars (glucose). Each tablet contains 139mg of Sodium. Quantity of Sodium per maximum daily adult dose is 1390mg. Each tablet contains 78mg of Potassium.

Allergen Free From: Dairy| Lactose| Soy| Yeast

Directions

Remove 2 tablets from the tube and replace the cap tightly. Dissolve tablets in 200mL of fresh cold drinking water (3 minutes). Sip slowly and frequently while symptoms persist. Discard any unused solution after 2 hours of 24 hours if refrigerated.

Not for dehydration caused by diarrhoea. Use only as directed.

If symptoms persist talk to your health professional. Adults only.

Do not use if tamper evident seal is broken or missing.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store tube tightly closed in a cool, dry place. Store below 25°C.

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Please recycle.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
